display_long_description:
# Join our Discord for the Secret Code required to play! frenzyextinction.com/discord

This is a LITE / DEMO build of Frenzy Extinction. Expect incomplete features, bugs, and missing content. 
# Buy the full game here: https://www.meta.com/experiences/frenzy-extinction/25176949381952074/
==========
[media]
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. The fast-paced, action-packed gameplay tests you and your team's ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.

**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. All weapons feature unique customizable looks and abilities that you can tailor your loadout with.

**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses at the end of each map. Test your skills and teamwork as you battle to escape the map and advance the story.

**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.

**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. All weapons feature unique customizable looks and abilities that you can tailor your loadout with.

**Epic Boss Battles**
